mapper.insert: insert into sys_catalog (cascade_id, root_key, root_name, name_, hotkey_, parent_id, is_leaf_, is_auto_expand, icon_name, sort_no) values (#{cascadeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAutoExpand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select id_, cascade_id, root_key, root_name, name_, hotkey_, parent_id, is_leaf_, is_auto_expand, icon_name, sort_no from sys_catalog where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
